meanings.definition: A written or printed work consisting of words.
meanings.sent1: I read a text about animals in the library.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to analyze the text for our homework.
meanings.sent3: The text on the menu made me hungry for pizza.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a comforting text during a difficult time.
meanings.sent5: The text describing the sunset was so vivid, I felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: The main body of a written work.
meanings.sent1: The text of the book was filled with suspense.

meanings.sent3: The text of the play was full of twists and turns.
